channel.title: raw-processing on Dmitry Avtonomov
channel.description: Recent content in raw-processing on Dmitry Avtonomov

item.title: IMTBX+Grppr
item.description: A suite of tools for extracting signals from Ion Mobility (IM) data (IM-MS, LC-IM-MS) and performing isotopic envelopes detection.

item.title: DIA-Umpire
item.description: DIA-Umpire - Data Independent Acquisition (DIA) data processing tool that doens’t require a spectral library. Detects features in MS1 and MS2, correlates precursors to fragments based on elution profile similarity and compiles pseudo-MS/MS spectra from these groups, which can later be searched with standard proteomic search tools. - Efficient calculation of isotopic fine structure up to predefined aggregated probability.
